item.title: What’s a family in family-wise error control?[resources]
item.dc:creator: Yuhang Xu
item.description:
I am reading this post by Daniel Lakens.

What’s a family in family-wise error control?

https://daniellakens.blogspot.com/2020/03/whats-family-in-family-wise-error.html

I will post my own views later.
